name: End_Of_The_World
description:
This game was developed as a part of the "One Game A Week" Project Seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Science in Hamburg, short UE Hamburg. 

The topic of the Week was: "End of the World"

Description:

If you have two chances.. which one will you take? And was it the right one?

Press [ESC] to open the Pause Menu.

Credits:

• Danarcade_exe

Pictures: Wallup.net (I don't own any rights to the pictures!)

Music:
